content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Wedding Packages

Entertainment & Ceremony Package

Pre drinks and canapés

Chef’s selection of canapés served on  arrival to your guests in Oliver’s Lounge Bar or on the Balcony with a selection of Australian wines, heavy and light beer, soft drink and orange juice.
The bridal party have the option of relaxing in their own private suite enjoying drinks and canapés.

Three course menu

Your selection of (2) two entrees served alternate style, (2) two main courses served alternate style and (2) desserts, followed by specialty tea buffet, Nespresso coffee and chocolates.
Beverage package

A selection of Australian beers & wine and an assortment of soft drinks and  juice served over a (4 ½) hour period.  Spirits are available from our Bar.

Bridal Suite

Complimentary overnight accommodation in the luxurious Bridal Suite, including sparkling wine, chocolates,  full breakfast for two and a 12pm late checkout. (Terms and conditions apply)

Entertainment Package 

Personalise your evening with the availability of the services of a DJ or MC, creating memories that you will have forever.  Their services can be booked for an additional fee.

Ceremony Package

Elegant seating, red carpet, floral décor for  the signing table and post ceremony refreshments in one of our private and intimate rooms for the Bridal Party.
Please contact our Wedding Co-Ordinator, events@canterburyinternational.com.au

 

Custom Wedding Package

At the Canterbury International Hotel we will ensure your special day perfectly reflects you and your love. Our Wedding co-ordinator and the events team will create a custom wedding package just for you and make your wedding and reception a day that will be remembered by you and your guests for a lifetime.

From formal Weddings and receptions to more intimate and relaxed functions, we appreciate that discerning couples trust our skilled staff to create lifelong memories on your special day.

Our Wedding Co-Ordinator will style a package to suit your exact needs, contact events@canterburyinternational.com.au

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
